system.description: This spell creates an immobile, invisible cubical prison of either bars of force (20-ft. cube) or solid walls of force (10-ft. cube). Creatures within the area are contained unless too big to fit (spell fails). Teleportation and astral travel allow escape; the force extends into the Ethereal Plane. Resists dispel magic; vulnerable to disintegrate, sphere of annihilation, rod of cancellation. Barred cage: half-inch gaps; creatures that fit can escape; others have cover. Windowless cell: no way in or out.

components.materialDescription: Ruby dust worth 1,500 gp, tossed into the air and consumed.

system.target: Barred cage (20-ft. cube) or windowless cell (10-ft. cube)
